title: 3PM
content:
Updates: health risks of cell phone use; global ‘honey laundering’; filming “Poverty Inc”. Prof Sherry Turkle is the... <!--more--> Abby Rockefeller Mauze Professor of the Social Studies of Science and Technology department at MIT; she specializes in the interface between high technology, computer culture and human psychology & behavior.
 “Alone Together: Why We Expect More from Technology and Less from Each Other” –condenses years of research into the behavioral effects of technology on human relationships.
